channel.title: Help making a PS
channel.description:
Hello, i need help, i've tried to make a pserver literally over 20 times, i've failed each and everyone.... it's very upsetting. I want to make one more then anything, please can somebody help me make one, people say it's so quick to make all i need help with is getting a working source and file and getting it online, no coding, please if anyone has like 10 minutes free time please let me know it would be so much appreciated
EDIT: I posted this before and everyone said i was just trying to get people to make me a sever, no? Not at all? I just need help getting a source / client online, i know how to code? I specifically said NO CODING, i just need help with the basics of getting it online, i can edit it myself.

item.title: Help making a PS
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

Matie:

I have a Belkin router, and no i haven’t

Pm’ed you, when you contact me back we’ll have it up within a hour.

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a PS
item.dc:creator: @Matie Matie
item.description:
@Matie wrote:

I have a Belkin router, and no i haven’t

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a PS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Matie:

I can play local, i can’t get it online for others to play. Port Forwarding and stuff, i’ve tried but it won’t work ever.

Now we’re getting somewhere.

What router do you have and what have you tried?
Have you asked your ISP if it’s possible?

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a PS
item.dc:creator: @Krugiztar Krugiztar
item.description:
@Krugiztar wrote:

After port forwarding, Toy need a software like NOIP / DUC and you need to create a host and host it from there, thats what worked in my past experiences with rsps’s, you could PM me your skype and I could overlook it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a PS
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Matie, post:8, topic:554859”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=673782.msg4505083#msg4505083 date=1456642951]

What are you stuck on? You fail to mention this.

If it’s getting an error, show it.

Every time i get a source / client i don’t know how to get it online, it just dosen’t work, i do the YT steps step by step and still get error connecting to server,

“Getting it online” is different than “Getting it so I can play locally”

Set the IP address in the client to localhost. Run the server. Run the client. login.
[/quote]

I can play local, i can’t get it online for others to play. Port Forwarding and stuff, i’ve tried but it won’t work ever.[/quote]

YES BUT WHICH PART ARE YOU HAVING TROUBLE WITH

Read full topic

Set the IP address in the client to localhost. Run the server. Run the client. login.[/quote]

Set the IP address in the client to localhost. Run the server. Run the client. login.
